Title: An Act Converting the Buayan Barangay High School in the Municipality of Kabasalan, Province of Zamboanga Del Sur, into a National High School to be Known as the Buayan National High School and Appropriating Funds Therefor
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 600
An Act Converting the Buayan Barangay High School in the Municipality of Kabasalan, Province of Zamboanga Del Sur, into a National High School to be Known as the Buayan National High School and Appropriating Funds Therefor
Section 1. The Buayan Barangay High School in the Municipality of Kabasalan, Province of Zamboanga del Sur, is converted into a national high school to be known as the Buayan National High School.
Section 2. The operation of said school for the current fiscal year shall continue to be funded out of local funds and from its share of national aid to local schools. The requirements for succeeding fiscal years shall be provided in the forthcoming General Appropriations Acts.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1a\^/phi1
Approved: June 24, 1983
